body:
I thought of making this forum game.
Here is how you play:
The person asks you a situation like 
 Seth: What would you do if you had to jump out of a plane.
Replier: Not Jump obviously.
Question: What would you do if you needed to fly to the Moon?
Replier:Fly to Mars instead
and so on.



Question: What would you do if you had to throw your computer out of your window right now for a Game show to earn a Mac ?
